titleStmt.title: The iudgement of a most reuerend and learned man from beyond the seas concerning a threefold order of bishops, with a declaration of certaine other waightie points, concerning the discipline and gouernement of the Church.
titleStmt.author: Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605.
Fielde, John, d. 1588.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The iudgement of a learned man.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
